text: Tessa Gordon (born 27 January 1967) is a Trinidad and Tobago-born Canadian taekwondo athlete. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where taekwondo was a demonstration sport, in the welterweight event. She won a bronze medal at the 1987 World Taekwondo Championships. At the 1987 World Taekwondo Championships she won the bronze medal and at the Pan American Taekwondo Championships she won the gold medal in 1986 and the silver medal in 1988. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian martial artists Category:Taekwondo practitioners Category:Olympians for Canada
title: Tessa Gordon
